Trusty etc. Since o

thowght yt verie necessarie to have

ny footem

rvice and succo

a
ce

th

rvice:
although we thynk nether of th
e
c

alledg any resonable cause of ther Want

full

rvice showld not be performed, wee will yowe in o

th

any of th

rvice, yowe shall declare unto them

forever

r
wag
and incurre o
r
further displesure according to the qualletie of
theire offence/ And for the nominac
